definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓還是電能的過度消費者與浪費者。

sentences.english: A variety of products and models of electric energy meter .
sentences.chinese: 和各種產品型號的電能表。

sentences.english: Think of a battery as a bottle for energy, and the power density as the size of the bottle’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 想象電池是一個能量瓶，電能密度就是瓶頸的尺寸。

sentences.english: Here heat energy transforms to electricity.
The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.
sentences.chinese: 電車的電能是通過架空線供給的。

sentences.english: A much smaller power loss occurs in the cable when energy is transmitted at high voltage.
sentences.chinese: 用高壓輸送電能時，沿輸電線的功率損耗小得多。

sentences.english: The technique turns the banana peel carbon into electricity.
sentences.chinese: 這種技術將香蕉皮中的碳轉化成電能。

sentences.english: The basic function of a reference electrode is to maintain a constant electrical potential .
sentences.chinese: 參比電極的基本功用是維持一個恆定的電能。

sentences.english: A new nanomaterial can convert sound waves into electricity.
sentences.chinese: 一種新型納米材料能夠將聲波轉化成電能。

sentences.english: They do consume electricity, generated by coal fire plants.
sentences.chinese: 電動自行車消耗電能，而電是由火電廠發的。

sentences.english: Pioneer is a concept shoe that coverts kinetic walking energy into electrical energy.
sentences.chinese: 此雙概念鞋拉開了動能轉變爲電能的帷幕。

sentences.english: You need to know the amount of power your dryer consumes.
sentences.chinese: 你所需要知道的就是你的烘衣機消耗的電能是多少。

sentences.english: And the power switches are used to control the direction of power flow.
sentences.chinese: 電能開關是控制能流方向的元件。

sentences.english: Highlights the power of information collection equipment selection, such as intelligent energy meters.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹了用電信息採集設備的選型，如智能電能表。

sentences.english: The electrical energy transformable into some other form of energy.
sentences.chinese: 可以轉換爲某些其他形式能量的電能。

sentences.english: Therefor the system of the full electronic watt-hour meter of prepayment has widely application prospect.
sentences.chinese: 因此，預付費電子電能表系統具有廣泛的應用前景。

definition: Standard and Poor (share index)/abbr. for 標準普爾|标准普尔[Biao1 zhun3 Pu3 er3]
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
(Tw) to lower (prices, interest rates etc)/to reduce/to cut
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
quantity of electric charge or current
to flee from danger/to avoid danger/to minimize risk/(finance) hedge
